newsitem.title: USA: Marine Drilling closes $100 mln credit deal.
newsitem.headline: Marine Drilling closes $100 mln credit deal.

text.p: Marine Drilling Cos Inc said on Tuesday that it closed a new $100 million credit facility led by Bankers Trust Co as agent and Christiania Bank og Kreditkasse as co-agent.
The facility provides for a three-year revolving loan that converts to a four-year term loan, Marine Drilling said.
The loan is secured by the company's present rig fleet and certain other assets, the company said.
Proceeds from this facility are available for the company's use to fund future rig acquisitions and upgrades, Marine Drilling said.
Marine Drilling said it terminated its prior $35 million credit facility with CIT Group, effective February 21, 1997.
